name: Eagle Flight Academy CC - Hartswater
about: Eagle Flight Academy CC, located in Hartswater, Northern Cape, South Africa, is a SACAA-approved flight training school dedicated to developing pilots with a professional attitude and genuine operational capability. We offer a range of training programs, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), and National Pilots Licence (NPL). Our training is designed to be comprehensive and cost-effective, ensuring students achieve the required standards. With a focus on international and domestic clients, we provide premium flight training and foreign license validations. Our fleet and modern facilities at Tempe Airport support a thorough and practical learning experience. For those interested in becoming a pilot, Eagle Flight Academy is committed to delivering high-quality training to prepare you for a successful aviation career. Contact us today to start your journey.
services: ["Private Pilot License\nCommercial Pilot License\nNational Pilots License"]
